summary: This is a domestic witness travel request form from the SDNY Victim/Witness Unit, dated September 8, 2021, for a fact witness to appear for trial preparation in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell. The witness is scheduled to be in New York from September 29 to October 1, 2021.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case referenced in the travel request form, United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ed Tyrrell
persons.context: Mentioned in the instructions as a contact for questions regarding witness travel funding for investigative interviews.

events.title: Witness Trial Preparation Session
events.description: A fact witness is scheduled to appear for trial preparation in the SDNY at 10 a.m.

events.title: Witness Trial Preparation Session
events.description: A fact witness is scheduled to appear for a second day of trial preparation in the SDNY at 10 a.m.

keyFacts: A fact witness was scheduled for trial preparation in the Ghislaine Maxwell case in late September/early October 2021.
The witness was not a victim-witness, a government employee, or facing criminal charges.
The travel was authorized under the FEWS appropriation specifically for court testimony or preparation.
The document is a standard administrative form, indicating the procedural steps for witness management in a high-profile federal case.
